attributes.action: Illegal for media outlets to make statements which may incite public panic.
attributes.additional_details: Irresponsible journalism causes panic buying from a large number of people which intern has a knock on effect on key workers and vital services.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for media organisations to make statements which could incite public panic.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
